author: cnbc.com
title: AppFolio, Inc. Announces Date of First Financial Results Conference Call
text:
SANTA BARBARA, Calif., April 16, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- AppFolio, Inc. (NASDAQ:APPF), a leading provider of cloud-based business software solutions, today announced that it will report its first quarter of 2018 financial results after the close of the U.S. financial markets on Monday, April 30, 2018.
AppFolio to discuss financial results at 1:30 p.m. Pacific Time, 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time, on Monday, April 30, 2018. Investors are invited to submit questions to management via the Investor Q&A form located on the Investor Overview section of the IR page at http://ir.appfolioinc.com .
The conference call can be accessed by dialing 866.393.4306 and entering ID # 1019149. International callers may dial 734.385.2616. A replay of the conference call will be available through May 3, 2018 at 855.859.2056 and 404.537.3406 for international callers. A live and recorded webcast of the conference call will be available at http://ir.appfolioinc.com .
About AppFolio
AppFolio's mission is to revolutionize vertical industry businesses by providing great software and service. Our cloud-based solutions serve over 20,000 customers in the real estate and legal markets. Today our products include property management software ( AppFolio Property Manager ) and legal practice management software ( MyCase ). AppFolio was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Santa Barbara, CA. Learn more at www.appfolioinc.com .
Investor Relations Contact:
Erica Abrams, 805.364.6093
ir@appfolio.com
